page_view.name: Page View
page_view.description: Triggered when a user views a page.

properties.name: Page Name
properties.description: The name of the page that was viewed.

add_user.name: Add User
add_user.description: Triggered when an admin adds a user to their team. This requires a paid plan.

properties.name: Role
properties.description: The role of the user that was added.
